items.sentence: It now takes me longer to do things than it used to.
Another batch of cookies are coming out of the oven.
They say we'll have an earthquake one of these days.
The doctor reassured me about my father's condition.
The ice on the lake is too thin to bear your weight.
Tom lives in a three-story house in the city center.
The video cameras are mainly there to deter thieves.
I wonder what it would be like to be married to Tom.
I still can't believe Tom and I are getting married.
I didn't know Tom was famous when we started dating.
